Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.reactive

Class Dispatcher

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.reactive.Dispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameController, LobbyController, MatchmakingController, ServerDispatcher
public abstract class Dispatcher extends Object implements Controller
Abstract class for a dispatcher that can execute an action and notify listeners.
